summary: Fixes Amulet Of Articulation levelling and a small bug in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone,

I was creating a mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7590]Skyrim Leveled items can level up Unique upgrade ballanced[/url] and during creating of that mod I found out why there is a problem in Amulet Of Articulation as described in [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Leveled_Items]Leveled Items[/url]. This is a simple mod that fixes that problem. The amulet should be now properly leveled.

[color=red]If you decide to use the above [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7590]Unique Leveled items mod[/url] please do not install this fix as they will be fighting with each other. Use one or the other.[/color]


[color=red]Also check out my other mods and the once I helped with:[/color]
